actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate estate and gift taxes on interspousal transfers which are not transfers of terminable interests.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the limitations on the amount of the estate and gift tax marital deduction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate estate and gift taxes on interspousal transfers which are not transfers of terminable interests.
